quest.name: ArmorForDagobert
quest.title: Armor For Dagobert
quest.description: Dagobert, the consultant at the bank of Semos, asked me to find a leather_cuirass for him.
quest.gm-description: * QUEST: Armor for Dagobert * * PARTICIPANTS: * - Dagobert, the consultant at the bank of Semos * * STEPS: * - Dagobert asks you to find a leather_cuirass. * - You get a leather_cuirass, e.g. by killing a cyclops. * - Dagobert sees your leather_cuirass and asks for it and then thanks you. * * REWARD: * - 50 XP * - 80 gold * * REPETITIONS: * - None.

history.item: I have met Dagobert. He is the consultant at the bank in Semos.
I promissed to find a leather_cuirass for him because he has been robbed.
He asked me to find a leather_cuirass but I rejected his request.
I found a leather_cuirass and will take it to Dagobert
I took the leather_cuirass to Dagobert. He thanked me and gave a small reward.

hints.item: I see that you take a leather_cuirass from a dead cyclops
I see that you fight some cyclopes living in the dungeon deep under Semos.
